name: FeedElementInput

fields.name: capabilities
fields.description: The capabilities that define auxiliary information on this feed element.

fields.name: feedElementType
fields.description: The type of feed element this input represents.

fields.name: subjectId
fields.description: The ID of the parent this feed element is being posted to. This value can be the ID of a user, group, or record, or the string me to indicate the context user.In version 45.0 and later, you can move a feed element from one public group to another by setting this property to the ID of the new public group. You can’t include or change any other properties when moving a feed element.

description: Feed elements are the top-level items that a feed contains. Feeds are feed element containers.
